name: Concoction (rbwhitaker)
description:
Mix color elements into your cauldron to brew a potion that matches the color of the goal potion. Complete the tasks in each level to beat it.

The game includes four different color palettes (RGB, CMYK, CMY, and HSV) across 50 levels, each with unique challenges. Race against time, complete the task while using limited potion bottles, and ensure your potions are a quality match.

Don't forget, you can adjust the heat under the cauldron to speed up or slow down brewing!
